name: OUTFOX: Luck of the Cards
description:
". . . Hey! Wait a damn minute! Who said we'd ever go along with your little games? I'd personally rather die than kill someone innocent!" "Who said any of you were innocent, huhhh?" "Innocent until proven guilty! I'm not going along with this! I'm going to find a way out of this hell hole, and there's no stopping me!"

OUTFOX stars Keitaro Meishu, a down on his luck police officer who receives a strange invitation to a new history museum. It turns out to be a trap, and now he and thirteen others are locked inside with no way out. Well- there is one way out. Everyone must draw a card from a randomized machine: thirteen sheep and one fox card rest inside. If you draw the fox card, you must kill someone else within three days' time, or face the deadly consequences. If you manage to kill without being caught and face the Hunting Grounds Games, you may leave alone while one at random receives punishment in your place. 

Over the course of your stay in the World's History Museum, Keitaro will grow closer to the fourteen others he is trapped with. If you play your cards right, maybe you will gain yourself a powerful ally, or even something more. Not every choice is the right answer, so put your detective caps on and let us get right into the nitty-gritty!

Featuring: 

-A Fully Playable Prologue Demo!

-Game Mechanics inspired by Danganronpa, The Werewolf Game, and Escape the Night

-An LGBTQ+ and POC inclusive cast, including the protagonist!

-Awesome VAs and 6 Game Chapters

-Original Soundtrack

-Fan Discord Server for Updates and Full Character Bios: https://discord.gg/h367vRrBD3
